mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification (email, token, expired_at, is_used) VALUES (#{email}, #{token}, #{expiredAt}, #{isUsed})
mapper.update: UPDATE email_verification SET is_used = true WHERE email = #{email} AND is_used = false AND expired_at > NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT created_at FROM email_verification WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
